dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.line: The Princess fades into nothingness, her look of disappointment burned into your mind. The cabin feels colder now, the shadows deeper.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.line: You have saved the world from her lies. But a hero who wins through deceit is a different kind of hero altogether.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.line: Your reflection in the blade is... darker than it was before.
The story continues, but it is stained by your choice. The world you saved does not feel righteous. It feels... hollow.
